options.description: coordinates are zero-based
column number for region start [4]
skip comment lines starting with CHAR [null]
generate CSI index for VCF (default is TBI)
column number for region end (if no end, set INT to -b) [5]
overwrite existing index without asking
set minimal interval size for CSI indices to 2^INT [14]
gff, bed, sam, vcf
column number for sequence names (suppressed by -p) [1]
skip first INT lines [0]
print also the header lines
print only the header lines
list chromosome names
replace the header with the content of FILE
restrict to regions listed in the file
similar to -R but streams rather than index-jumps
do not download the index file
set cache size to INT megabytes (0 disables) [10]
separate the output by corresponding regions
set verbosity [3]
